name: SALLYLAND 2048
description:
★SALLY LAND 2048 GRAND OPENING★

Complete the mission of collecting the number tiles with 2048 PLAY
and create a Sally Land full of attractions!

TIP!
- A Coin bonus balloon appears when you create a [2048] number tile!
- Coins produced after constructing a building must be collected fast to gain more coins.

Characters & Items
- Sally creates a game item every time you make a 1024 number tile!
1) Chicken sally -
2) Bee sally -
3) Hiphop sally -
